== Devalmakki (602619) ==
      
Devalmakki is a village in the [[Karwar ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 647.54 hectares and harbouring 184 households with total population of 739 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[KARWAR]] is at a distance of 28 km. Male population is 372 and female population is 367. Scheduled Caste Population is 21 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 602619<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 552
* Literate male population: 304 (81.72%)
* Literate female population: 248 (67.57%)
